summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 20, 21 and 22, Mt. Baker Park Addition, being the alleys between 33rd Avenue South and 34th Avenue South, from McClellan Street to College Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 76520, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
